questions_and_notes: Why not go with annual samples and eliminate masso-Omon?  Or let user calculate from monthly samples (which is quite easy).
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 1 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: sum where sea time: mean
comment: Total mass of liquid sea water. For Boussinesq models, report this diagnostic as Boussinesq reference density times total volume.
